form.longName: PhenX PX080901 - Oral Hygiene Personal Care
form.preferredDefinition: These interview-administered questions were administered during a participant visit that included a complete dental examination. They address an individual's dental hygiene, including the frequency of brushing and flossing.

question.questionText: How often do you brush your teeth? (brush_teeth_frequency)

validValue.meaningText: Not applicable (Full Dentures, Upper and Lower-FDUL)
validValue.description: Not applicable (Full Dentures, Upper and Lower-FDUL)

question.questionText: Do you use dental floss? (use_dental_floss)

validValue.meaningText: Not applicable (Full Dentures, Upper and Lower-FDUL)
validValue.description: Not applicable (Full Dentures, Upper and Lower-FDUL)

protocol.preferredDefinition: These interview-administered questions were administered during a participant visit that included a complete dental examination. They address an individual's dental hygiene, including the frequency of brushing and flossing.

form.preferredDefinition: These interviewer-administered questions address painful sores around or in the mouth and assess the existence of oral mucosal lesions.

question.questionText: (During the past 6 months) Did you have painful sores or irritations around the lips or on the tongue, cheeks, or gums more than once? (mouth_sore_irritation_multiple_times)
Did you first have the sores or irritations more than 6 months ago? (mouth_sore_irritation_six_months)

protocol.preferredDefinition: These interviewer-administered questions address painful sores around or in the mouth and assess the existence of oral mucosal lesions.

form.longName: PhenX PX080301 - Dental Caries Experience Prevalence
form.preferredDefinition: The Decayed, Missing, or Filled Tooth Surfaces (DMFS) Index is used by a dentist or dental hygienist to determine the prevalence of coronal caries in permanent and primary teeth through an examination that records the three components.

question.questionText: The Decayed, Missing, or Filled Tooth Surfaces Index is used by a dentist or dental hygienist to determine the prevalence of coronal caries in permanent and primary teeth through an examination that records the three components. This variable records tooth code to assess the Missing Teeth (the M Component of the DMFS Index) for tooth Upper Right 2M (dmf_index_ur2m_tooth_code)

validValue.meaningText: Sound permanent tooth (no decay or filling on any surface)
validValue.description: Sound permanent tooth (no decay or filling on any surface)

validValue.meaningText: Missing due to dental disease (caries/periodontal disease)
validValue.description: Missing due to dental disease (caries/periodontal disease)

validValue.meaningText: Missing due to other causes (orthodontic/traumatic or other non-disease)
validValue.description: Missing due to other causes (orthodontic/traumatic or other non-disease)

validValue.meaningText: Missing due to dental disease but replaced by a fixed restoration
validValue.description: Missing due to dental disease but replaced by a fixed restoration

validValue.meaningText: Missing due to other causes but replaced by a fixed restoration
validValue.description: Missing due to other causes but replaced by a fixed restoration

validValue.meaningText: Missing due to dental disease but replaced by a removable restoration
validValue.description: Missing due to dental disease but replaced by a removable restoration

validValue.description: Tooth present, condition cannot be assessed

form.longName: PhenX PX080201 - Consumption Of Sweet Beverages
form.preferredDefinition: These parent-report questions provide information on the amount of concentrated sweets a 3-to-5-year-old child consumed during the past week.

headerInstruction.text: Please complete the following table by clicking YES or NO for each of the beverages that your child may have consumed during the past week. For beverages that your child drank, write the number of servings (per day or week) that your child dra..TRUNCATED

question.questionText: Did your child consume Cows' Milk during the past week? (cow_milk_past_week)
How many servings of Cows' Milk per day did your child drink? (cow_milk_servings_day)
How many servings of Cows' Milk per week did your child drink? (cow_milk_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Cows' Milk per serving during the past week? (cow_milk_serving_amount)
Did your child consume 100% Juice during the past week? (pure_juice_past_week)
How many servings of 100% Juice per day did your child drink? (pure_juice_servings_day)
How many servings of 100% Juice per week did your child drink? (pure_juice_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of 100% Juice per serving during the past week? (pure_juice_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Juice Drinks during the past week? (juice_drinks_past_week)
How many servings of Juice Drinks per day did your child drink? (juice_drinks_servings_day)
How many servings of Juice Drinks per week did your child drink? (juice_drinks_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Juice Drinks per serving during the past week? (juice_drinks_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Water during the past week? (water_past_week)
How many servings of Water per day did your child drink? (water_servings_day)
How many servings of Water per week did your child drink? (water_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Water per serving during the past week? (water_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Flavored Water during the past week? (flavored_water_past_week)
How many servings of Flavored Water per day did your child drink? (flavored_water_servings_day)
How many servings of Flavored Water per week did your child drink? (flavored_water_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Flavored Water per serving during the past week? (flavored_water_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Sugared Beverages made from Powder (e.g., KoolAid®) during the past week? (sugared_powder_past_week)
How many servings of Sugared Beverages made from Powder (e.g., KoolAid®) per day did your child drink? (sugared_powder_servings_day)
How many servings of Sugared Beverages made from Powder (e.g., KoolAid®) per week did your child drink? (sugared_powder_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Sugared Beverages made from Powder (e.g., KoolAid®) per serving during the past week? (sugared_powder_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Sugarfree Beverages made from Powder (e.g., Crystal Light®) during the past week? (sugar_free_powder_past_week)
How many servings of Sugarfree Beverages made from Powder (e.g., Crystal Light®) per day did your child drink? (sugar_free_powder_servings_day)
How many servings of Sugarfree Beverages made from Powder (e.g., Crystal Light®) per week did your child drink? (sugar_free_powder_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Sugarfree Beverages made from Powder (e.g., Crystal Light®) per serving during the past week? (sugar_free_powder_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Regular Pop (e.g., Pepsi®, Coke®) during the past week? (regular_pop_past_week)
How many servings of Regular Pop (e.g., Pepsi®, Coke®) per day did your child drink? (regular_pop_servings_day)
How many servings of Regular Pop (e.g., Pepsi®, Coke®) per week did your child drink? (regular_pop_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Regular Pop (e.g., Pepsi®, Coke®) per serving during the past week? (regular_pop_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Diet Pop during the past week? (diet_pop_past_week)
How many servings of Diet Pop per day did your child drink? (diet_pop_servings_day)
How many servings of Diet Pop per week did your child drink? (diet_pop_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Diet Pop per serving during the past week? (diet_pop_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Sports Drinks (e.g., Gatorade®, Powerade®) during the past week? (sports_drinks_past_week)
How many servings of Sports Drinks (e.g., Gatorade®, Powerade®) per day did your child drink? (sports_drinks_servings_day)
How many servings of Sports Drinks (e.g., Gatorade®, Powerade®) per week did your child drink? (sports_drinks_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Sports Drinks (e.g., Gatorade®, Powerade®) per serving during the past week? (sports_drinks_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Other Sugared Beverages (e.g., lemonade, sweetened tea) during the past week? (other_sugared_past_week)
How many servings of Other Sugared Beverages (e.g., lemonade, sweetened tea) per day did your child drink? (other_sugared_servings_day)
How many servings of Other Sugared Beverages (e.g., lemonade, sweetened tea) per week did your child drink? (other_sugared_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Other Sugared Beverages (e.g., lemonade, sweetened tea) per serving during the past week? (other_sugared_serving_amount)
Did your child consume Other Sugarfree Beverages (e.g., iced tea, coffee) during the past week? (other_sugar_free_past_week)
How many servings of Other Sugarfree Beverages (e.g., iced tea, coffee) per day did your child drink? (other_sugar_free_servings_day)
How many servings of Other Sugarfree Beverages (e.g., iced tea, coffee) per week did your child drink? (other_sugar_free_servings_week)
The amount (in ounces) of Other Sugarfree Beverages (e.g., iced tea, coffee) per serving during the past week? (other_sugar_free_serving_amount)
Please check the best response to the following questions. (consumption_sweet_other)
If your child drinks cows' milk, what type of cows' milk does your child usually drink? (cow_milk_type)
What type of container does your child most often use for beverages? (beverage_most_use_container_type)

validValue.description: Product container (e.g., juice box, pop can, or bottle)
